name: Pew Pew Patrol
description:
Rev up the engine and lock and load for this retro-style side-scrolling shoot em' up! In Pew Pew Patrol, you take control of a squad car. Your objective is to prevent criminal getaway cars from reaching the far end of the stage. Use your handgun to blast away enemies, or crash into them to take them out. Whatever you do, stay vigilant; the highway is full of civillians as well. Be sure not to crash into them, and if you shoot any civillian cars, it's an instant game over!

Criminal cars are denoted by their green color, while civillians cars are white.

Toggle in-game music in the Options menu from the titlescreen.
